thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Cruise reviewer

author: Cruise reviewer
title: Cruise reviewer
text: Reviewed cruise prices from several websites, this was by far the cheapest. My bookings consultants were pleasant to deal with but weren't going to go out of their way to provide extra assistance. Last year I booked a cruise with Michael who was such a great help, maybe he set the standard too high for others to follow. I'm excited about my cruise and love the price I paid!!
